es.csic.iiia.nsm.norm.generation.cbr

Class CaseBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.nsm.norm.generation.cbr.CaseBase

  • public class CaseBase
extends java.lang.Object
    A case base is a base of CBR cases. Each case in the case base represents a conflicting situation that contains some solutions aimed to solve the case
    Author:
    "Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"
    See Also:
    Case
